verses.roman:
yogya pātra haya gūḍha-rasa-vivecane
tumio kahio tāre gūḍha-rasākhyāne

synonyms: yogya—suitable; pātra—recipient; haya—is; gūḍha—confidential; rasa—the mellows; vivecane—in analyzing; tumio—you also; kahio—instruct; tāre—him; gūḍha—confidential; rasa—the mellows; ākhyāne—in describing.
translation: "I accept Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī as quite fit to understand the confidential mellows of devotional service, and I recommend that you explain devotional service to him further."
